attributes.action: Save the Harland & Wolff boat builders building, Bootle
attributes.additional_details: Once again more of Liverpools historical heritage is under threat of demolition. It would be a crime to level this fabulous building to the ground with its amazing maritime connections to the White Star line. Sefton Council have mentioned it would be to costly to refurbish, surely there are other avenues which they could explore to acquire the means to save Harland & Wolff Boat Builders, Bootle, Liverpool.
